folder_description: My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.
My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.
My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.
My love, I'm so happy we get to serve God together. Ang mga after church dates nga ni are one of thest best times nga maka bonding kita. In fellowship and in love.

Our first date.
Probably the cutest date we had. That time may gin process kita sa cultural and that was a spontaneous nga hagad. We went to Madge Cafe pagkatapos gin dala taka sa babaw sng Gaisano kay wala ka kabalo may ara pana to sang mga churches and activities. HAHA what a cute moment

Sa amuni nga time we stopped by somewhere dira sa esplanade nga may mga plungkuan. Tapos after na, gapang explore kaya. Nagsaka kada kay gusto mo i-check AHAHAHA. Pagkita mo puno ka tubig nga higko üò≠
Pati ako gin persuade mo masaka man AHAHAHAH
We were walking sa esplanade and naabutan ta dawn. Hambal ko "Picturi ko bala tas i-story." HAHAHA hambal mo sakon dason "Indi nana karon lowkey, soft launch nana "

So hapon na ni after ta kwa sanb DBP stub. Nakagwa nata kag mapa Jaro, upod ta si Lorenz tapos nakita tapa si Syrel AHHAHAA. Gin pauntat ta gid ang trike para makasabay sya. Dungan ta dason apat pa DBP. Pag-abot ta, sarado na galeeee so we decided mapa Fort nalang. We took some Cute pics here hihi.
Cute tadi hihi üíï
Yawan sya pic sakon AHHAAHAH
Yawan sya pic sakon AHHAAHAH
Amuni aton background sa Messengerü´∂ü´∂

So story time, you always said you had the birthday blues. Plus, that day daan the weather was bad. I can't help but feel so bad as well because we celebrated my birthday pero indi ta ya pag celebrate imo. Nagdecide ko nga i-continue and I also had the gifts ready already. You were so happy that dayü•∫ü•∫
I really love taking polaroid photos. Gin gastusan tagd ang film HAHAHA
I really love taking polaroid photos. Gin gastusan tagd ang film HAHAHA

These are the gifts I gave you. 1. Ang knitted vest. You really loved that one too kay I saw you wearing one so I decided I'd buy you one. 2. Ang Let Go book ko nga wala kopa natapos. I really wanted you to have that because makabulig gid siya sa pag-grow mo. 3. Ang ring. That ring is so special for damo siya symbolism and you kept on wearing it everyday until now ü•∫ü•∫

A very memorable dateüòä. We planned out my brithday nga medyo bongga. May itinerary pana. Gin hulam ko dason ang polaroid ka classmate ko so that we could have physical photos of our date and we brought films. First, nagpa GT Mall para mag-ukay then nag kaon sa JD, we even got us a cake. Damo-damo pagkaon dasonüò≠üò≠ AHHAAHAH. After that, nag pa downtown ta to do more ukay. After all that, nag stay kita sa Esplanade para mag pic some more. That was really really cuteeee üíñüíñ
Photobooth picsss. Cutesy lang hihi
Officially pinned sila duwa ü•∞ü•∞
Story time. Naglagaw ta sa festive then naglakat ta pa Sunset Boulevard. Nagstay ta to for a while tas gulpi lang nagbundak ang ulan. AAHAHHA mga basang sisiw
You loved this pic of us a lotü•π. Cutie
AHAHAHAHA nagbundak na ulan tas isa lang payong ta. Ang gamay-gamay ko pana nga payong üò≠üò≠
AHAHAHAHA nagbundak na ulan tas isa lang payong ta. Ang gamay-gamay ko pana nga payong üò≠üò≠
Pangurumbot sya ihhh AHHAHAH
Pangurumbot sya ihhh AHHAHAH

This is an amazing day were the angels in heaven rejoiced. Amuni ang first time mo magbalik sa church. That day, you ga duwa-duwa kapa mag-upod sa church but I tried my best to assure you and nagkadto ka. Look at you now, glowing in Jesus.üòäüòä

Day of The Way Concert. Nagpa Pitmaster pa ta to have our lunch date, cutieeesss. Then pagtapos to, nagattend na kita concert. Sa tunga-tunga sang concert, gulpi lang nag-ulan pero sige gyapon worship. That was amazing!
Gina baisan tapa kung i-post ko ang mga pics kay kesyo, indi daw nami kuha ya üò≠üò≠
mga basang sisiw liwat üê§

Another majestic date. Amuni ang story nga first time ko maghatag sa imo sng flower. We were walking along Esplanade and you were looking at flowers. Then, gin kaptan ko ang isa ka flower and it fell down. Gin kwa ko siya and I gave it to you. You said, "First muni nga flower gn hatag sakon". I said, "Really?" then followed up with this beautiful quote "Love, bal-an mo ngaa wilted flower? Because sang gin pa meet kita, we were not at our best. We got to know each other at out lowest point."And I think that's beautiful ü•πü•π
Wala ko balo kung din ta ni halin basta ara ta sa Espla ah HAHAHAAH
We saw two cattos ga dogsinganay as we were walkingüê±üê±
We saw two cattos ga dogsinganay as we were walkingüê±üê±
You said you would preserve this flower. So, gin butang mo siya sa likod sng phone mo para mag dry ü•Äü•Ä
